to write his own songs for his debut album. According to The Mirror, Simon Cowell has approved the singer's request to pen his own tracks for the upcoming LP. A source said: Simon Cowell and Matt Cardle spoke over Christmas and texted ideas about what Matt Cardle wants to do. Simon Cowell has said that he wants him to write and co-write some songs. "They know they want great material, if the songs are penned by Matt Cardle then even better. He's chuffed.

41-year-old, currently Controller of BBC Global News, replaces Andy Coulson , who resigned earlier this month amid the continuing row over phone-hacking when he was editor of the News of the World. Mr David Cameron said: I am very pleased that Craig Oliver is to become the new Director of Communications at 10 Downing Street. "Craig has formidable experience as a broadcast journalist. He will do an excellent job in explaining and communicating the Government's programme. Mr Oliver said: "I'm delighted to be joining David Cameron and his team at such an exciting and challenging time. "It's difficult to leave the BBC after a fascinating few years

In the notoriously cut-throat music industry, Simon Cowell says he's learned it's crucial not to show weakness to competitors.
